titles.title: More Love, More Power, More Of You In My Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
More love, more power,
More of You in my life!
More love, more power,
More of You in my life!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will worship You with all of my strength.
And I will worship You with all heart
For You are my God.
